setSelectedImage(img)} >

18K Gold Friendship Ring

★★★★☆ {" "} (24 Reviews)
$109.99 $89.99

This elegant 18K Gold Friendship Ring is a perfect blend of style and sentiment. Designed for daily wear and crafted with precision, it adds a touch of sparkle to any outfit.

  • Category: Rings
  • Material: 18K Gold Plated
  • SKU: RG-10245
{/* Tabs for description/reviews */}

Crafted with a radiant gold finish, this friendship ring is symbolic of everlasting bonds. Its minimal yet classy design makes it perfect for gifting or everyday wear.

  • Metal: 18K Gold Plated
  • Weight: 12g
  • Size Options: 6, 7, 8
  • Stone Type: Cubic Zirconia

★★★★☆

Very pretty and lightweight. Totally worth it!

★★★★★

Loved the shine! Looks even better than the pictures.

Good design but delivery was a bit late.
